name: Pete Lovely
introduction: Gerard Carlton "Pete" Lovely (April 11 1926 Livingston, Montana - May 15 2011 - Tacoma, Washington) was a United States driver and businessman. He owned a very successful Volkswagen dealership in the Pacific Northwest, and entered a total of 11 Formula One races through the years, always as a privateer and usually running Lotus cars. After retiring from Formula One, he continued to be active in local racing and historical events. He also owned "Pete Lovely Racing", a restoration shop that specialized in older Formula One and prototype cars. He continued to drive some of his historic cars into the 2000s.
